data.name: Flutter Day India
data.description: Flutter Day India is an online event driven by Indian Flutter Communities to gather all Flutter passionates and learn to create beautiful apps! Our goal is to share Flutter knowledge, improve Flutter skills, and expand the Flutter community. Flutter Day India will take place on June 27, 2020.
